S04jnalokau:305: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadevanikāyeṣu darśanābhāso bhavati,
S04jnalokau:306: tasyaiva mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena /
S04jnalokau:307: na ca mañjuśrīs teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām evaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:310: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śūnyo vaśiko 'bhūto 'nakṣaro 'ghoṣo 'deśo 'bhāvo 'cintyo 'nimittaś cittamanovijñānāpagato 'nutpanno 'niruddhaḥ /
S04jnalokau:311: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena, (JĀA 36)
S04jnalokau:312_1: sarvakuśalamūlādhiṣṭhānena lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtas tathāgataḥ pratibimbam iva loke saṃdṛśyate,
S04jnalokau:314: na ca mañjuśrīr ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ caivaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:316: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatātmabhāvāl lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtāt sarvatathāgateryāpatheṣu śūnyeṣu nānāvidhivicitrāṇāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahādharmadeśanā niścarati /
S04jnalokau:317: sā ca dharmadeśanā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
S04jnalokau:318: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samayaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
S04jnalokau:319: tad anenāpi te mañjuśrīḥ paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S04jnalokau:322: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat /
S04jnalokau:324: anutpādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
S04jnalokau:325: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayo asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke // 1 //
S04jnalokau:326: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
S04jnalokau:327: na cātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // 2 //
S04jnalokau:330: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo jambūdvīpe pūrvataram eva tāvad mahāśailendrarājānam avabhāsayanti /
S04jnalokau:333: tataḥ paścād iha jambūdvīpe nimnān pṛthivīpradeśān avabhāsayanti /
S04jnalokau:334: te ca mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo na kalpayanti,
S04jnalokau:354: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivyām uccanīcamadhyaviśeṣeṇa hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāvabhāsasya cchāyā vaicitryaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:355: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kalpayati,
S04jnalokau:394: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalajñānaraśmayas traidhātuke 'nantamadhyadharmadhātvapratihataraśmyavabhāsapramuktāḥ /
S04jnalokau:395: prasṛtāś ca raśmayaḥ pūrvataram eva mahāśailendrakalpādhyāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:398: tataḥ paścāt kuśalādhyāśayānāṃ yathādhimuktīnāṃ sattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:399: tataḥ paścād antaśo mithyātvaniyateṣu sattvasaṃtāneṣu kāye tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalaraśmayo nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:402: tatra ca tathāgato mañjuśrīḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
S04jnalokau:417: kuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ ca sattvānām āśayaṃ viditvā viśodhayiṣyāmi,
S04jnalokau:419: yāvad mithyātvaniyatānām api sattvānāṃ yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi /
S04jnalokau:423: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalāśayasaṃtānavaicitryāt tathāgatajñānasūryamaṇḍalaraśmyavabhāsasya vaicitryaṃ bhavati //
S04jnalokau:426: tadyathā mañjuśrīr asti mahāsāgare sarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tad dhvajāgrāvabaddham /
S04jnalokau:430: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04jnalokau:432: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04jnalokau:461: na nāma na rūpaṃ na nimittam,
S04jnalokau:470: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñānaratnam adhyāśayapariśuddhaṃ mahākaruṇādhvajāgrāvabaddham,
S04jnalokau:471: tato yo yathāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ sa tathā dharmadeśanāṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānāti /
S04jnalokau:472: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ //
S04jnalokau:475: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkām anyarutavijñaptito niścarantīṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:476: sā ca nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S04jnalokau:488: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:509: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkā nānārutaghoṣā nānādhyāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutaghoṣavijñaptito niścarati /
S04jnalokau:511: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nātīto nānāgato na pratyutpannaḥ,
S04jnalokau:523: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:545: atha ca mañjuśrīr nānāvimuktāḥ sattvā nānādhyāśayavijñaptitas tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti //
S04jnalokau:548: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivīṃ niśritya pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:553: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:554: śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā mahāyānikānāṃ vā, anyeṣāṃ (JĀA 45)
S04jnalokau:556: yāni cānyāny antaśo mithyātvaniyatānāṃ kuśalamūlāni sarvāṇi tāni tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:573: tadyathā mañjuśrīr ākāśaṃ sarvatra samaṃ nirvikalpaṃ nirviśeṣam,
S04jnalokau:596: atha mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsthānasya hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭatayākāśaṃ hīnotkṛṣṭaṃ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:597: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvatra samo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04jnalokau:616: atha ca mañjuśrīr ye hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāśayāḥ sattvās te hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti //
S04jnalokau:627: sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya hīnāṃ śrāvakayānakathāṃ kariṣye /
S04jnalokau:635: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
S04jnalokau:647: na mañjuśrīs tathāgatasya nāmarūpaniruktyānusāri vijñānaṃ pravartate /
S04jnalokau:651: sarvadharmasamatākoṭī mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ samaḥ sarvatra nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04jnalokau:658: yā mañjuśrīr anupalabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sā samatā,
S04jnalokau:664: evaṃ darśinaś ca viparyastāc cittacaitasikā na pravartante /
S04jnalokau:668: yadā na pracarati tadā na saṃcarati /
S04jnalokau:669: yadā na saṃcarati tadā na visarati /
S04jnalokau:680: yaś ca niyāmaprāptaḥ sa sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati /
S04jnalokau:681: yadā sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati tadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati /
S04jnalokau:682: yadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati tadā na bhavati na vibhavati /
S04jnalokau:683: yadā na bhavati na vibhavati tadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati /
S04jnalokau:684: yadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati tadā yoniśodharmaprayukto bhavati /
S04jnalokau:685: yoniśodharmaprayuktasya na kaścid dharmo 'sti yo na buddhadharmaḥ /
S04jnalokau:699: na tatra prayogo na pramāṇaṃ na phalasākṣātkriyā /
S04jnalokau:701: prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ tac cāgantukair upakleśair upakliśyate na ca prakṛtiḥ saṃkliśyate /
S04jnalokau:703: yā cāsaṃkleśatā tatra pratipakṣo nāsti yena pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ syāt /
S04jnalokau:705: na śuddhaḥ śudhyati śuddha eva saḥ /
S04jnalokau:708: yaś cāninditaḥ sa nandīprahāṇaṃ tatra sarvasnehā nirudhyante /
S04jnalokau:715: tathatāpratiṣṭhitāś ca sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca /
S04jnalokau:716: yā ca tathatā na tatra saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ /
S04jnalokau:717: yatra na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ sā tathatā /
S04jnalokau:724: yā najātutathatā sā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate /
S04jnalokau:725: yā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate sā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
S04jnalokau:726: yā notpadyate na nirudhyate sā nirvāṇena samā /
S04jnalokau:727: yā nirvāṇena samā sā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti /
S04jnalokau:728: yā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti sā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
S04jnalokau:729: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā sā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā /
S04jnalokau:730: yā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā sā tathatā //
S04jnalokau:734: tathaiva tathatā cātmā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
S04jnalokau:743: yad arthānugamajñānaṃ vijñānānugamaṃ cedam ucyate jñānam /
S04jnalokau:748: yārthānugamajñānena vijñānānugamajñānena nītārthānugamajñānena ca sā dharmatā /
S04jnalokau:778: tatra bodhisattvena saṃkleśahetur vyavadānahetuś ca parijñātavyaḥ /
S04jnalokau:779: saṃkleśahetuviśuddhyā ca vyavadānaviśuddhyā ca na sthātavyam//
S04jnalokau:805: sarve te dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā asvāmikā aparigrahā nirvyāpārā māyopamā alakṣaṇā adhyātmopaśāntāḥ /
S04jnalokau:816: na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasyotpādo nirodho vā bhavet //
S04jnalokau:820: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatena bodhiḥ prāptā /
S04jnalokau:824: tatra katamad bhagavan mūlaṃ katamat pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:827: tat tathāgatena mañjuśrīr bodhisamatayā sarvadharmasamatā jñātā /
S04jnalokau:828: tasmād ucyate mañjuśrīr amūlāpratiṣṭhānā tathāgatena bodhir abhisaṃbuddheti //
S04jnalokau:836: cakśur mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04jnalokau:839: sa cakṣuḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya rūpeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:841: evaṃ śrotraṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04jnalokau:844: sa śrotraṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya śabdeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:849: sa ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya gandheṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:854: sa jihvā śūnyeti parijñāya raseṣu na (JĀA 55)
S04jnalokau:859: sa kāyaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya spraṣṭavyeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:861: mano mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04jnalokau:864: sa manaḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya dharmeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:881: tathā cāvatārṣīd yathā tathatāyā nāpāraṃ na pāraṃ samanupaśyati /
S04jnalokau:904: bodhir mañjuśrīr nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā tryadhvasamā trimaṇḍalaparicchinnā /
S04jnalokau:909: sa cittamanovijñānāpratiṣṭhito na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S04jnalokau:910: anavakalpayann avikalpayan nātītaṃ karoty anāgataṃ na manyate pratyutpannaṃ na prapañcayati //
S04jnalokau:920: yan mañjuśrīr na cittamanovijñānavijñeyaṃ tad asaṃskṛtam /
S04jnalokau:921: asaṃskṛtam ucyate yatra notpādo na sthitir na vyayaḥ /
S04jnalokau:947: bodhir mañjuśrīr na kāyenābhisambudhyate na cittena /
S04jnalokau:950: cittaṃ ca māyopamaṃ riktaṃ tuccham abhūtam asaṃskṛtam /
S04jnalokau:951: yo mañjuśrīr evaṃ kāyasya cittasya cāvabodhaḥ,
S04jnalokau:955: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kāyena vā cittena vā dharmeṇa vā adharmeṇa vā bhūtena vābhūtena vā satyena vā mṛṣā vā vacanīyā //
S04jnalokau:959: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kiñcit sthānaṃ yena ca vyavahāraṃ gacchet /
S04jnalokau:960: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśasthānam asaṃskṛtam anutpannam aniruddham avacanīyaṃ tathā mañjuśrīr bodhir asaṃskṛtāsthānānutpannāniruddhāvacanīyā /
S04jnalokau:961: yathā mañjuśrīr bhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ sarvadharmair avacanīyam,
S04jnalokau:962: evam eva mañjuśrīr bodhir bhūtā parigaveṣyamāṇā sarvadharmair avacanīyā /
S04jnalokau:977: abhisaṃbudhya cakṣuṣo 'nanugrahāya rūpānupalabdhitaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ na pratiṣṭhitam /
S04jnalokau:984: tenāpratiṣṭhitavijñānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
S04jnalokau:986: katamāni catvāri yad uta rūpaṃ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:987: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:988: tāni khalu punar imāni mañjuśrīś catvāri cittasya pratiṣṭhānāni tathāgatenānutpannāny aniruddhānīti jñātāni //
S04jnalokau:991: bodhir iti mañjuśrīḥ śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam /
S04jnalokau:992: yayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ śūnyā tayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ /
S04jnalokau:995: api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīr ekanayam etad yad uta śūnyatā vā bodhir vā /
S04jnalokau:996: yatra mañjuśrīr na śūnyatā na bodhiḥ,
S04jnalokau:997: na tatra mañjuśrīḥ kiṃcid dvayaṃ yena dvayena śūnyatā vā bodhir vā dvidhākriyate /
S04jnalokau:999: advayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anāmāno 'nimittāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anutpannā aniruddhā (JĀA 61)
S04jnalokau:1001: yat punar ucyate mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam iti,
S04jnalokau:1003: na punar atra mañjuśrīḥ paramārthataḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ śūnyam ity ucyate /
S04jnalokau:1004: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśam ākāśam ity ucyate,
S04jnalokau:1006: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ śūnyaṃ śūnyam ity ucyate,
S04jnalokau:1008: anāmakā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmānām ataś ca vyākriyante /
S04jnalokau:1009: na mañjuśrīr nāma deśasthaṃ na pradeśasthaṃ /
S04jnalokau:1011: nāmnā yo dharmo 'bhilapyate so 'pi dharmo na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
S04jnalokau:1012: evam ete mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena jñātā ādita evājātā anutpannā aniruddhā alakṣaṇāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ /
S04jnalokau:1019: viṣamaṃ bodhir api na samā na viṣamā /
S04jnalokau:1021: yasya mañjuśrīr dharmasya na bhūtapariniṣpattir nāsau samo na viṣamo vā vaktavya iti /
S04jnalokau:1022: hi mañjuśrīs tathāgatena sarvadharmā asamā aviṣamā abhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S04jnalokau:1023: tathā cābhisaṃbuddhā athāṇur api na samīkṛto na viṣamīkṛtaḥ /
S04jnalokau:1024: yādṛśā eva te dharmāḥ tādṛśā eva vijñātāḥ /
S04jnalokau:1025: bhūtajñānena katamac ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ,
S04jnalokau:1029: asvāmikā aparigrahāś ca mañjuśrīḥ prati vigacchanti /
S04jnalokau:1030: iti hi mañjuśrīḥ saṃbhavanti vibhavanti ca pratītya dharme vartante na cātra kaścid vartayitā /
S04jnalokau:1031: tad ucyate dharmopacchedāya tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayatīti //
S04jnalokau:1037: yathā bodhis tathā rūpaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1038: yathā bodhis tathā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1039: yathā bodhis tathā pṛthivīdhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1040: (JĀA 63) yathā bodhis tathāpdhātus tejodhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1041: yathā bodhis tathā cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1042: yathā hi mañjuśrīr bodhis tathā śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:1046: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartante /
S04jnalokau:1049: sā tathāgatena yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhā yathaiva pūrvāt tathā paścāt tathā madhye /
S04jnalokau:1054: na cātra mañjuśrīr ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ copalabhyate //
